value:
$WmMPID_水着ノワール,ch04_26_Noir_F_Swim18,Face|$w0|Eek! D-don't you dare come any
closer, you... You...$k$pVILE FIENDS! I SHALL USE THIS
BOW TO SINK YOU BENEATH THE
WAVES!$k$p

$WmMPID_水着ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Swim18,Face|$w0|Let's not worry about why a knight is
battling in a swimsuit. Let's just get
this over with!$k$p

$WmMPID_水着タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Swim18,Face|$w0|Don't you just love the beach? I can
feel my skin absorbing the sun's
warmth! Now, let's dive into battle!$k$p

$WmMPID_水着ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Swim18,Face|$w0|Isn't this swimsuit simply wonderful?
There's nothing formal about it—it's
just comfortable!$k$pCareful, now. One wrong move and
you'll be answering to Ephraim and
my brother!$k$p

$WmMPID_水着ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Swim18,Face|$w0|Fall back, Tana. Now that I'm here,
there's no way we will lose.$k$pYou there! You should all take this
opportunity to fully appreciate...my
flawless swimming!$k$p

$WmMPID_水着カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Swim18,Face|$w0|There's no ocean to jump into, so you
can jump straight into my arms
instead!$k$p
